sharedContent.title:
A Korean top prop trader Bill Hwang was liquidated of his entire 15B position on over 80B gross notional exposure yesterday ... might be among the biggest liquidation in recent years for a Aisa prop shop 

Many of his position are Chinese big tech stock like TME, BIDU, VIPS etc

nodes.title:
At $7.72 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.55 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne
